add_network.description: 了解如何在MetaMask等加密货币钱包中轻松添加{{chainName}}和其他网络。
add_network.intro_paragraph: 向钱包添加网络的过程可能略有不同，这取决于你使用的钱包。下面的步骤是针对MetaMask的。如果你使用其他钱包，很可能有一个类似的过程，你可以参考。
add_network.sidebar_title: 为你的钱包添加一个网络

step_1.title: 1.打开你的钱包，进入 "添加网络 "页面。

step_2.paragraph_1: 输入所需细节后，您可以点击 "保存"，将{{chainName}}添加到MetaMask。
step_2.paragraph_2: 或者，你可以使用我们的一键式按钮，这样你就不需要手动输入所需的细节。
step_2.title: 2.输入所需的细节并点击 "保存"。

add_network.title: 添加{{chainName}}到MetaMask

home.intro_paragraph: We created the Revoke.cash Learn section to help you understand how you can stay safe in the world of web3. It covers the very basics of web3 and then moves on to more advanced topics. We'll be adding more articles over time so be sure to check back regularly.

meta.description: The world of web3 can be confusing, but it doesn't have to be. We've put together a collection of resources to help you learn about web3, wallet security and more.
meta.title: Learn About Web3, Wallet Security and More
